long_description: Featuring plenty of feel and flex, the lightweight men's Brooks PureConnect 3 Road-Running Shoes give you just enough shoe to make tight turns and take off on a spontaneous breakaway. Lightweight uppers feature highly breathable polyester mesh and a rubber instep band to provide a comfortable, secure fit regardless of foot shape. Ideal Heel design uses a curved heel to encourage foot contact points to shift you forward, helping to align joints and reduce stresses. Midsoles feature BioMoGo polymer alloy foam, which provides cushioning, energy return and reduced foot fatigue; nontoxic additive helps midsoles break down in landfill. Omega flex grooves enhance midsole flexibility while offering great cushioning. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Split toe groove under the forefoot enables the big toe to function independently and helps encourage natural balance. Low-profile rubber outsoles grip well on the road, sidewalk and gentle trails. Designed around an anatomic foot shape, Brooks PureConnect 3 Road-Running Shoes contour to the feet, providing a glovelike fit.
short_description: Featuring plenty of feel and flex, the lightweight men's Brooks PureConnect 3 Road-Running Shoes give you just enough shoe to make tight turns and take off on a spontaneous breakaway.
